description: Lead a team fo Android developers to develop, design and launch +30 mobile applications for Sportian
· Development, design and requirements gathering of new functionalities, structure, initialization, MPV, etc
· Planning and organising the team, tasks, developments, etc., setting project objectives
· Providing technical guidance and support to team members
· CollaboraJon with other leaders and products to ensure project objectives
Extensive experience in Android development, design and maintenance using kotlin and Jetpack Compose
· Initial application development and project structuring
· Development and design of new requirements and development support

· A multi-modular SaaS application for football and rugby clubs and leagues, official application of LaLigaTech now Sportian. Making official apps for clubs like Sevilla FC, Club America, APF, Rayo Vallecano, etc, or leagues like ProLeague, MLR.
Development, design and maintenance of several android apps with Kotlin
· An official application for the health service of Castilla La Mancha (Sescam)
· An application for the Management of the Care Plan for People with Chronic Pain (ePaidol)
· An application with Artificial Intelligence to detect in advance diseases and pests in crops (iAgri)
· And the different applications of Correos Express, as the application of carriers and shipments, ship and parcel management, management of trucks and cargo, etc.. (CEX)
Development, design and maintenance of several Android Apps with Kotlin
· An application to manage hotel and transport bookings for businesses (Vyootrip)
· An auction application for retailers (Glosper)
· An application for booking home health services and healthcare assistance (Sanidae)
Development, design and maintenance of an Android app with Java
· An application for POS terminals in restaurants, cafés, cafés and businesses related to the hospitality industry (Turbopos)
